name: Terratonic
description:
Play through a mysterious world as Omnia, a hero with no prior memories that has to find the secrets of the world! Combine both smarts and skill in this adventure as you'll have to face platformer as well as turn based mechanics. Enjoy the hand crafted graphics in discovering the story of Omnia.

Made by Mabo Soda studios

-This is only a beta of our game. What you will find for now is a simple version presenting the simple mechanics that the game has currently. Everything you see is subject to change. We plan on adding a multitude of other features, such as an overarching story and more customization, so please keep that in mind as you're playing.

-We are a new group of young devs who tried their hand at making a game in unity. We had no prior experience and the game was a learning experience for all of us. We intend to update the game as reguralry as we can to add features in, but we are still discovering unity
